title: UFC OCE
body: If you're a fan of MMA or fighting in general then feel free to add Me (IGN: Teki) if you like a some casual discussion about anything fighting, upcoming fights, sharing highlight videos etc. If you're also a fan of Tony Ferguson, well boy do we have a treat for you as the man himself is part of our little club, the only condition to entering this group is you've gotta supply the boys with the best 'Tony Ferguson is the type of guy...' quote.
